Text:
Nu's strategy was unsuccessful... Next, I'll offer
my advice.

I'm counting on you, Omega. Looks like surprises
won't work. What's your strategy?
Well... This time, let's push for the vibe.

Giving chocolates in a romantic setting will
definitely make it feel special. For instance...

Mmm, delicious! The seasoning is subtle but
perfect...I think!

I'm glad it suits your taste. This restaurant is a
favorite of mine.

But are you sure it's okay? Treating me to such a
fancy place...
Don't worry about it. You're special.

Yeah? I don't quite get it, but I'll take your word
for it.
Heheh. Feel free to order anything.

(A delicious meal and a pleasant atmosphere...
Everything's set. Now it's all up to me...)

With food this good, I'm looking forward to dessert.
Can I order some?

Before that...Cid. There's something I want to give
you...

â€¦Say no more. I've memorized all the details
of the plan.
...Huh?
Find the rat hidden among us...right?
...You're perceptive, aren't you?

(A rat... Someone from the Cult is here. Now's not
the time for chocolates...)
I'll just go freshen up my makeup.
Alright.

Alpha treating me to such a fancy restaurant...
That can only mean...

She's going all out with this shadowbroker stuff...
Man, she's a good sport.

Who would've thought there'd be someone from the
Cult among the guests? Luckily, we caught them,
but...
*sigh* Another failure...
Heh... Now it's my turn.
Oh? You seem pretty confident.

Yes, there's no way this will fail. After all, all
you need to do is act... Something you already
do during regular missions.

You just need to create a mood not influenced by
your surroundings, but by you.
I see. For Lady Alpha, that should be quite easy.

That would be a better way to deal with unforeseen
circumstances.

Lure him out into the night with sweet words and
give him chocolate under the moonlight... I think
it's a good plan.
Sweet words, huh... What should I say...?

"I don't want to go home yet..." How about that? A
wistful expression and an upward gaze are essential.

Maybe something more direct would be better. "This
is a token of my feelings!" or something like that.
Are you seriously telling Lady Alpha to do that?!

It's fine, Lambda. I understand the importance of
acting. They're not wrong.

Alright, let's give it a try. Picture Master Shadow
is right in front of you and speak.
Shadow... Okay, I'll try.
I don't...want to go...home yet...!
...Huh?
Th-This is a token...of my feelings...!
That was...vocal practice, wasn't it? My apologies.

No, I was saying it for real... I imagined him right
in front of me.

You act so effortlessly during missions, but it's so
different when you're in front of Master Shadow...!
Chi! Mind your words!

But this might be a bit challenging. If a trainee
acted like this, imagine what kind of harsh words
Lambda would have for her.
Agh...! W-Well...!
Was it really that bad...?
...What's important is to keep practicing.
Right. It's all to make him happy...

Alpha asked to meet me the day after she treated me
to a meal. And she's uncharacteristically late...
...I see. So that's what this is...
I'm sorry, Cid. Did I keep you waiting?
T-Today, um...I don't want to go home...!
...I thought as much.
I want to convey my feelings to you...!
No need to say more. I understand everything.
Huh? What do you mean...?

(I'm sure Alpha's motivation for her "shadowbroker"
play is peaking just about now!)

(Her tardiness today is probably her practicing the
"hero arrives late" trope. It's a standard move,
but it takes on a special meaning when Alpha does
it. In that case...)
Tonight, I'll accompany you wherever you go.
R-Right! Of course!

*sigh* Who knew there was a Cult base in a place
like this...

Following Master Shadow, overlooking the city,
identifying the base...

Impressive... It's as if Master Shadow is guiding us
to the right answers.
Yes, he really is special. Butâ€”
The mission itself failed...

Lady Alpha. Please leave the rest to us and get some
rest.

...Thank you. I'll take you up on that. I'm quite
exhausted today...
Lady Alpha...
...How can I dispel her worries...?
